topGifts.description: The Spirit-given ability to deeply understand, analyze, and articulate biblical truths and doctrinal insights with intellectual clarity and precision.
The Spirit-given ability to show compassion and kindness to those who are suffering, hurting, or in distress, bringing comfort and demonstrating God's love through acts of care.
The Spirit-given ability to identify and meet practical needs in the church through hands-on work, often behind the scenes, to support ministry and bless others.
The Spirit-given ability to organize, coordinate, and manage details, resources, and people effectively to accomplish ministry goals and maintain order in the church.
The Spirit-given ability to encourage, comfort, and urge others toward obedience, faithfulness, and spiritual growth through words of counsel, comfort, or challenge.
The Spirit-given ability to show compassion and kindness to those who are suffering, hurting, or in distress, bringing comfort and demonstrating God's love through acts of care.
The Spirit-given ability to come alongside others in their time of need, providing personal assistance, care, and support to alleviate burdens and bring comfort.
The Spirit-given ability to trust God with extraordinary confidence, to see His purposes accomplished, and to move forward boldly even when circumstances seem impossible.
The Spirit-given ability to identify and meet practical needs in the church through hands-on work, often behind the scenes, to support ministry and bless others.
The Spirit-given ability to warmly welcome and care for people, creating an environment where others feel valued, comfortable, and at home, reflecting God's love through generous hosting.

The Spirit-given ability to trust God with extraordinary confidence, to see His purposes accomplished, and to move forward boldly even when circumstances seem impossible.
The Spirit-given ability to cast vision, provide direction, and motivate others toward God's purposes, guiding the church with wisdom and spiritual insight.
The Spirit-given ability to effectively share the gospel with unbelievers and lead them to faith in Jesus Christ with clarity and conviction.

The Spirit-given ability to apply biblical truths and spiritual principles wisely to life situations, guiding others in godly and practical decision-making.
